tossup_question: -   –  Which of the following genes would initially establish the axes of the Drosophila body?
tossup_MCQoptions:
W)Homeotic genes
X)Hox genes
Y)Maternal effect genes
Z)Embryonic lethal genes
bonus_question: -   –  What autoimmune disease results in damage to cartilage and the bones of joints, resulting in painful inflammation?
